title: league wont open

embed.description: So I've had this problem before and managed to fix it myself, but now it's getting to the point of being aggravating. Every time I try to open league the icon pops up for maybe a second then goes away. I've looked at all the threads and youtube videos and nothing has helped so far.

body:
At a friends house with that fucked up harddrive case sensitive bullshit imac of course. Told me league was working four to three days ago. 

someone said something regarding the process of deleting 'lockfile'

if i cannot install so that the game client runs properly what would be the next step since there is no applications folder  to properly install. I encountered the Command as ditto {{champion:115}}  so i can put that folder in his non case sensitive drive?  Leauge is updating soon and id hate to see this happen...

EDIT 

TO BE CLEAR GAME CANNOT **Reconnect**

replies.body: If you're just having issues with connecting to the game when getting disconnected, it could very likely be a firewall or antivirus blocking your connection from getting through to our servers. It's not very uncommon, but you should be able to get around it by [**disabling or adding exceptions for League**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq3).
Yoooo! I cannot get into the game... it just stays stuck on "Authenticating.." I was literally playing 7-8 hours ago... and now since 8.2 my game will not login.
